mn54:2.3: ajjhogāhetvā → ajjhogahetvā (bj, sya-all, km); ajjhogāhitvā (pts1ed, mr)
mn54:3.14: Evaṁ kho me → evañca me (sya-all); evaṁ me (mr)
mn54:6.4: Ahañceva → ahañce (?) | anuviccāpi maṁ viññū → anuvicca viññū (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
mn54:15.2: upasumbheyya → upacchubheyya (bj, pts1ed); upacchūbheyya (sya-all, km); upaccumbheyya (mr)
mn54:17.3: daheyya aññataraṁ vā aññataraṁ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṁ → daheyya. aññataraṁ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṁ (bj, pts1ed); ḍaheyya … (sya-all)
mn54:20.1: yānaṁ vā → yānaṁ (sya-all, km, pts1ed) | poriseyyaṁ → poroseyyaṁ (bj, pts1ed, mr); oropeyya (sya-all, km)
mn54:21.18: amuko yo → asu yo (bj, pts1ed); amuko (sya-all)
